project.name: fspec
project.vision: Transform AI agents from code babysitters into autonomous builders through complete spec-driven infrastructure with Gherkin scenarios, TDD discipline, coverage tracking, and Kanban workflow management

primaryProblem.title: AI agents lack professional development infrastructure
primaryProblem.description: AI agents confabulate without quality examples, skip acceptance criteria, don't follow TDD discipline, lack checkpoint systems for experimentation, have no Kanban workflow tracking, no specification management, and no coverage tracking to link code to business rules. Developers are forced to micromanage AI agents instead of building features, resulting in wasted time and low-quality code.

solutionSpace.overview: A complete spec-driven development system for AI agents featuring Gherkin scenario management, Example Mapping discovery, Kanban workflow tracking, TDD enforcement through ACDD (Acceptance Criteria Driven Development), git-based checkpoint system for safe experimentation, coverage tracking linking code to business rules, and interactive TUI for workflow visualization. Transforms AI agents into autonomous builders through professional development infrastructure.

capabilities.name: Work Unit Management
capabilities.description: Create, track, and manage work units (stories, bugs, tasks) through Kanban workflow states (backlog → specifying → testing → implementing → validating → done)

capabilities.name: Gherkin Specification Management
capabilities.description: Create, edit, validate, and format Gherkin feature files with scenarios, steps, backgrounds, and examples

capabilities.name: Example Mapping Discovery
capabilities.description: Conduct Example Mapping sessions to clarify requirements through rules (blue cards), examples (green cards), and questions (red cards) before writing specifications

capabilities.name: Event Storming
capabilities.description: Capture domain events, commands, aggregates, policies, and bounded contexts for domain-driven design and tag discovery

capabilities.name: ACDD Workflow Enforcement
capabilities.description: Enforce Acceptance Criteria Driven Development through temporal validation, prefill detection, and state transition rules ensuring specs before tests, tests before code

capabilities.name: Coverage Tracking
capabilities.description: Link Gherkin scenarios to test files and implementation code for complete traceability from business rules to code

capabilities.name: Git Checkpoint System
capabilities.description: Create automatic and manual git-based checkpoints for safe experimentation, with conflict resolution and re-restoration support

capabilities.name: Tag Management & Ontology
capabilities.description: Organize features and scenarios using hierarchical tags with validation, statistics, and automatic tag discovery from Event Storming

capabilities.name: Lifecycle Hooks
capabilities.description: Execute custom scripts at workflow events (pre/post command execution) with blocking/non-blocking support and virtual work unit-scoped hooks

capabilities.name: Interactive Kanban TUI
capabilities.description: Real-time terminal UI for visualizing Kanban board, work unit details, checkpoints, attachments with markdown/mermaid rendering

capabilities.name: Reverse ACDD
capabilities.description: Reverse engineer existing codebases to generate work units, epics, feature files, and test skeletons for legacy code documentation

capabilities.name: Scenario Generation
capabilities.description: Automatically generate Gherkin scenarios from Example Mapping rules and examples with proper Given-When-Then structure

capabilities.name: Quality Gate Validation
capabilities.description: Validate Gherkin syntax, tag compliance, feature file structure, and enforce quality standards before workflow progression

capabilities.name: Attachment Management
capabilities.description: Attach and view markdown documents with mermaid diagrams to work units for rich documentation and visual designs

personas.name: AI Agent
personas.description: Autonomous coding assistant (Claude Code, Codex, etc.) that needs structured guidance to follow professional development practices
goals: Follow ACDD workflow without human micromanagement

personas.name: Developer
personas.description: Human developer managing AI agents and using fspec for project workflow
goals: Shepherd AI agents through professional development practices
Track project progress via Kanban board
Ensure quality through specifications and tests

personas.name: Product Owner
personas.description: Stakeholder defining features and acceptance criteria through Example Mapping
goals: Define clear acceptance criteria for features
Track work unit progress and priority
Ensure business rules are captured in Gherkin scenarios
Maintain traceability from business rules to code
